page.title: 18LIFE STYLES IN THE AREA
page.content: Most people moved to the area because they liked the situation of their house and the countryside. A smaller group were born here. Most people are skilled workers,or, in a profession or management. Most people enjoy their work. Many had had previous similar jobs. Only a few are self-employed. Few people work alone. Many people work locally,or in Ipswich but more work in London than in Colchester. As public transport is poor, many families own at least one car. Some people own boats. Only Chelmondiston has any shops, so many people have to buy food in other villages or nearby towns. Most people did feel that their local shops were adequate, but many said they preferred to use large super-markets. Most people would also like to have a Chemist's shop and a D.I.Y. store nearby.
